DOC.detailed_description: This study design randomize , open-label , single-center , crossover study evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics extended-release ( ER ) OROS paliperidone healthy Japanese adult . Of 20 Japanese volunteer enrol , least 6 men 6 woman . All volunteer receive single dos 3 mg ER OROS paliperidone without standard Japanese breakfast . There 1-week washout treatment , total treatment duration approximately 2 week . Volunteers randomly assign 1 2 treatment sequence group ( feed fast ; fast fed ) . The pharmacokinetics paliperidone assess 96 hour dose . Safety tolerability monitor throughout study . Prior initiate clinical trial Japan , food effect study require evaluate effect food pharmacokinetics ER OROS paliperidone Japanese adult . 3 mg tablet , single oral dose , fast feed condition
